summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2786 for the improvement of Second Avenue Northeast, from Woodlawn Avenue to East Seventy-seventh Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing, constructing concrete walks and stairways, providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 33325, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
